sourcing.instructions: C3 (Calcium Carbonate) - Available at chemical supply stores or online retailers.
steps: C3 (Calcium Carbonate) - Available at chemical supply stores or online retailers.
1. In a clean mixing bowl, combine 150 g of Calcium Carbonate (C3) and 75 g of Silica (SiO2).
preparation.raw_text: 1. In a clean mixing bowl, combine 150 g of Calcium Carbonate (C3) and 75 g of Silica (SiO2).

steps: 1. Transfer the mixture to a heat-resistant container.
heating.raw_text: 1. Transfer the mixture to a heat-resistant container.

steps: 1. Remove the container from the oven and allow it to cool to room temperature (approximately 20-25°C) for 1 hour.
cooling.raw_text: 1. Remove the container from the oven and allow it to cool to room temperature (approximately 20-25°C) for 1 hour.

steps: 1. Once cooled, carefully transfer the solid material to a work surface.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Once cooled, carefully transfer the solid material to a work surface.
